00176 #define RKH_CREATE_COMP_STATE( name,id,en,ex,parent,defchild,history )  \
00177                                                                         \
00178                                 extern rkhrom RKHTR_T name##_trtbl[];   \
00179                                                                         \
00180                                 rkhrom RKHSREG_T name =                 \
00181                                 {                                       \
00182                                     mkbase(RKH_COMPOSITE,id,name),      \
00183                                     mkcomp(en,ex,parent,name,           \
00184                                                 defchild,history)       \
00185                                 }
00186

00214                                                                         \

00216                                                                         \
00217                                 rkhrom RKHSREG_T name =                 \
00218                                 {                                       \
00219                                     mkbase(RKH_BASIC,id,name),          \
00220                                     mkbasic(en,ex,parent,name,prepro)   \
00221                                 }

00245 #define RKH_CREATE_COND_STATE( name,id )                                \
00246                                                                         \
00247                                 extern rkhrom RKHTR_T name##_trtbl[];   \
00248                                                                         \
00249                                 rkhrom RKHSCOND_T name =                \
00250                                 {                                       \

00252                                     name##_trtbl                        \

00298 #define RKH_CREATE_DEEP_HISTORY_STATE( name,id,parent )                 \
00299                                                                         \
00300                                 static rkhrom RKHSREG_T *ram##name;     \
00301                                                                         \
00302                                 rkhrom RKHSHIST_T name =                \
00303                                 {                                       \
00304                                     mkbase(RKH_DHISTORY,id,name),       \
00305                                     parent,&ram##name                   \
00306                                 }
